He’s got a legit fear of broken bones. Though he’s got two videos on it
I've never broken a bone. Hope I never do.
same, tom
Probably a good idea. As someone who's broken a lot of bones, lemme tell ya, it's not a great feeling.
A lot?!
Seems like a bad idea.
Around a dozen or so. Some broken ribs too, dunno how to count them.
The moral of the story is that I'm great at bad ideas.
Or bad at great ideas!
I like the way you think!
I’ve broke one bone
And I kept trying to move my arm
I thought all morning why Nora was doing so well. I think I know what the problem is. Legs disproportionately large. It doesn't look like feral dragon legs. It's more like anthro dragon legs.
It's been a while since I have. Last one was a few years ago and it wasn't even my fault. Dude sucker punched me and broke a cheekbone. That fuckin hurt lemme tell ya
Well I’m not sure it’s supposed to tickle
I broke my growth plate in my right arm. Cracked right down the middle
And so I'm a little confused. I like the way it looks and I don’t want to change it. But I feel that this is not good for ref sheet.
All I did was fall over a dead log

After it continued to hurt, which oddly enough was just a simple ach and not any kind of shooting pain, a few hours later we go to the er. And all they gave me was a splint because they “couldn’t diagnose broken bones on a minor”
Adrenaline is a helluva drug. When I broke my back on my dirtbike I managed to get up and walk around for a bit. Thought I only broke a couple ribs. Whoops.
The bone specialist the next day took one looks at that X-ray and just “ya, there’s the break”. Apparently it can be difficult to break that point. I’m special
If injured, stay. tf. still.
I’ve seen plenty of broken bones vids where it’s like “just push it back” or the moron is sitting there waving the bendy part around
Yeah, being a Boy Scout you'd think I'd know that. Turns out adrenaline's a helluva drug and it tells you to keep moving and get away from the danger.
Sir, of your lower leg looks like a fishing rod, LEAVE IT
Makes it hard when you ARE the danger
Didn't even think I was injured. Just a few broken ribs and a sprained ankle. I was 3 seconds from getting back on my bike and riding back to camp to have a lie down.
I will say a comment made on a gymnastics video. Girl landed between the legs on a balance beam and the reactor guy asked if women had vaginas made of kriptonite
I think he meant adamantium.
I found that way too funny but I’ve also done something similar. You bruise the absolute hell out of your legs and sometimes the pelvis
kriptonike was the Super Man thing
If you don’t break the pelvis
It hurts. You’re gonna be sore. But I will admit that the temporary is not often as bad as a mans as long as nothing breaks
Or vessels burst
I guess it is a bit.
I slightly bruised the side of my pelvis. It’s not fun
Or actually it may have been just the skin that bruised
Not to mention those bones are tapered. Not very thick. And that kind of top impact can fracture and break them easily
But as for my arm, it no longer bends up all the way and is weaker than my left
